About This Game
=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Welcome to the police department, where late work can lead to tragic 
consequences. You're a swamped with work detective - John Bishop who carries 
out his investigation till the late night. After a strange dream he gets awaken 
up by a mysterious call from an old â€œfriendâ€ and everything goes sideways. 
The police department is left without electricity, security system has been 
hacked and all exits are locked. But that is not the real problem. Someone is 
following you, someone red-eyed and made of steel. You better know them as 
animatronics. Figure out what is going on and remember - no one will hear you 
scream.
FEATURES
A tablet to watch the security cameras carefully. ?nvironment of the police 
station is the key to salvation. Be quiet, be alert, move fast, and remember 
you can only rely on your legs, tablet and a torch. 
Hide & Sneak. Use closets and cabinets to sneak between animatronics and catch 
a breath.
Animatronics. Their steel legs and arms will treat you well. Get ready to be 
confused with their abilities. 
Figure out whatâ€™s happening. Explore the police department in search of 
explanations. Donâ€™t forget to listen the world around and notice changes 
around. It can save your life.
